North Penn SD unveils the new propane fueling station at NPHS leading the way in the clean, quiet and inexpensive operation of our new propane-fueled school buses.

NPSDâ€™s efforts to convert its fleet from diesel to propane fueled buses began earlier this year as a result of receiving grants totaling more than $600,000 to purchase propane-fueled school buses and install a propane fueling station. The Blue Bird Vision Propane and Micro Bird buses, funded in part by the Volkswagen Environmental Mitigation Trust to support projects that reduce nitrogen oxides (NOx) emissions, began operation over the summer. The district plans to continue the partnership with the Pennsylvania Department of Environmental Protection to work to transition as many buses as possible to propane-fueled vehicles.
